section.section:
Upon the recommendation of the Secretary and with the advice and consent of the Senate, the Governor shall appoint the members from a list of names:
of architects, submitted by the Baltimore, Chesapeake Bay, and Potomac Valley chapters of the American Institute of Architects;
of engineers, submitted by the Maryland Society of Professional Engineers; and
of landscape architects, submitted by the Maryland Chapter of the American Society of Landscape Architects.
There shall be at least 5 names on the list submitted by each organization.
The Board shall consist of architects and at least 1 engineer, 1 landscape architect, and 1 architect who specializes or has particular experience in building preservation.

text.section: The term of a member is 4 years.

A member of the Board:
may not receive compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
